content.query:
CREATE VIEW country_wise AS
SELECT
    country_region,
    CAST(SUM(deaths) as INT) as [Total Death]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://azuredatalake4synapse.dfs.core.windows.net/azuredatalakefs4synapse/covid-19/bing_covid-19_data/bing_covid-19_data.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result] GROUP BY [result].country_region;
